name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-sso-csharp
title: Teams Tab SSO Authentication (C#)
shortDescription: This sample app showcases Azure Active Directory Single Sign-On (SSO) within a Microsoft Teams tab, utilizing the On-Behalf-Of flow to call Microsoft Graph APIs with C#.
longDescription: The Tabs Azure AD SSO Sample demonstrates how to implement Azure AD Single Sign-On in a Teams tab using C#. This application leverages the OBO flow to access Microsoft Graph APIs, enabling seamless user authentication and enhanced functionality within Teams.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing teams tab sso authentication (c#)

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
